data.title: All Things Audio In 5Hours Maximum With Optimised Quality In Rs 500
data.meta_description: We offer Copy Paste Jobs , Article writing jobs in India. These jobs are a great place to start if you want to earn some extra money from home with no work experience.
data.text:
About this Talent:

This is Miss Ghosh.

An adept professional with over 8 years of experience in the Indian advertising industry, I've had the privilege of collaborating with numerous top-tier brands, seamlessly juggling multiple roles. My leadership is fueled by a deep-seated passion for storytelling that not only captivates but also informs. With a commitment to timely delivery and uncompromising quality, I ensure each project exceeds expectations.

My academic foundation includes a Master's in Audio-Visual Communication from Bangalore and a Bachelor's in English from Kolkata. Currently, I have thrived in a leading advertising firm for the past 6years, where my multifaceted responsibilities encompass directing, photography, image retouching, videography, video editing, audio mixing, voice modulation, and art direction.

Beyond the professional realm, I'm an avid consumer of documentaries, music across various genres, and podcasts. I also indulge in occasional painting projects. If you seek expertise in anything visual-related, feel free to reach out. Let's create something remarkable together.
